title: Dark Side of the Moon
description: There lies beauty…in the heart of the beast...As the night of the full moon approaches, Erika’s fear for Laddy’s survival begins to escalate as history attempts to repeat itself. When an unexpected reality comes to light, Erika is forced to make a decision of which all options could bring about dire results. While Tobias struggles to uphold an exterior of hope for Laddy’s successful shift, inside he battles his fear of losing what’s left of his family. Now uncertain concerning Laddy’s origins, Ethan must decide whether to expose Laddy and the others to his vengeful father –or continue to protect them. Emotions run high as the events escalate and propel them all toward a cataclysmic end.
author: C.J. Bishop
